name: ecommerce-backend
description: PRODUCTS: --------- GET /api/Products        (Will return all products) GET /api/Products/4         (Will retrurn one product with id 4) POST /api/products          (Will add a new product in database) PATCH/PUT /api/Products/4   (Will update the product with id 4) DELETE /api/Product/4       (Will delete a product with id 4)
author: Babar Ali
